items.title: Version 6.3.7
items.content: The next version will include some major changes and it will be released after WP 6.5. Formatting module will be refactored to WP Interactivity API (and new Floating UI.js - moving away from Bootstrap JS) and will include 2 additional plugins: String Rotator and Count To.

items.title: Special thanks to:
items.content: Translation contributors: Dan Caragea, Vlad T, Peter Smits, Olivier Van Eester, Pieterjan Deneys.
